Will you help us?

Pangari is great magician, very powerful, but without the sun essences, for his potions, he can do nothing!

Sun essences can be found all aroundâ€”even some monsters carry them. If you can't find any out in the field, then you might be able to buy them, but they're so expensive!

Yay! Done, and quickly! This will help Pangari greatly.

Thank you, thank you!
Ingredients? Where are the sun essences? Did you collect them?
